channel.title: Comments on: Orange Tian – Daring Bakers Challenge March 2010

item.title: By: Apu
item.dc:creator: Apu
item.description:
Beautifully done - you have a great blog!!
Apu
item.content:encoded:
Beautifully done – you have a great blog!!

Apu

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: Mmm yummy... I wonder if you could substitute fresh peaches for the orange marmalade layer.
item.content:encoded: Mmm yummy… I wonder if you could substitute fresh peaches for the orange marmalade layer.

item.title: By: Kim
item.dc:creator: Kim
item.description: Both flavor combos look great! I like seeing the chocolate and plain whipped cream in your layering photo. Great job!
item.content:encoded: Both flavor combos look great! I like seeing the chocolate and plain whipped cream in your layering photo. Great job!

item.title: By: Sue
item.dc:creator: Sue
item.description: WOW! You did an amazing job on the Tian! I love the pop of color with the red candy:)
item.content:encoded: WOW! You did an amazing job on the Tian! I love the pop of color with the red candy:)

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: Lovely, great desserts. I did an alternative version of the tian for something different. I love how you created a jaffa version!
item.content:encoded: Lovely, great desserts. I did an alternative version of the tian for something different. I love how you created a jaffa version!

item.title: By: Sweets By Vicky
item.dc:creator: Sweets By Vicky
item.description: For the trouble you had with the caramel, you sure ended up with a really scrummy looking dessert! I love how you used different shaped moulds too! :) Caramel is tricky and u managed to tame it. yippee!
item.content:encoded: For the trouble you had with the caramel, you sure ended up with a really scrummy looking dessert! I love how you used different shaped moulds too! ðŸ™‚ Caramel is tricky and u managed to tame it. yippee!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: The chocolate whipped cream sounds so good! I've never heard of Jaffas before, but they look really good. I love the way that you used them in the presentation of the dessert!
item.content:encoded: The chocolate whipped cream sounds so good! I’ve never heard of Jaffas before, but they look really good. I love the way that you used them in the presentation of the dessert!

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: Your tian looks lovely. I also didn't think it would be as nice because oranges would not be my first choice but there you go one has to try before your make up your mind! I had the same trouble with the sauce.
item.content:encoded: Your tian looks lovely. I also didn’t think it would be as nice because oranges would not be my first choice but there you go one has to try before your make up your mind! I had the same trouble with the sauce.

item.title: By: Aparna
item.dc:creator: Aparna
item.description: Very nicely finished Tian. I like the chocolate drizzle on yours even better. :)
item.content:encoded: Very nicely finished Tian. I like the chocolate drizzle on yours even better. ðŸ™‚
